00024 std::set<View::RobotRef> NeighborView::get_visible_robots(const RobotData& robot) const {
00025 
00026     return OctreeUtilities::get_nearest_robots( octree(), robot.position(), robot.robot().id(), std::size_t(seen_objects_count() ) );
